function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased urbanization leading to overcrowding and density in cities","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease spread due to close proximity and increased contact among individuals","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce overcrowding and density, such as promoting remote work and flexible schedules, and enhancing public transportation","Technologies":"Urban planning and design technologies for creating more open spaces and pedestrian-friendly environments","People":"Urban residents, especially those living in densely populated areas","Owner":"Local government and urban planners"},{"Description":"Stressful everyday lifestyle leading to weakened immune systems","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to contagious diseases and slower recovery from illness","Mitigation":"Promoting access to green spaces, mental health support, and stress-reduction initiatives","Technologies":"Health and wellness technologies for monitoring and improving mental and physical health","People":"Urban residents, particularly those with high stress levels","Owner":"Local health authorities and community organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of access to green spaces and natural environments","Impact":"Reduced opportunities for physical activity, relaxation, and mental well-being","Mitigation":"Developing and maintaining UGS, creating green corridors, and ensuring equitable access to nature","Technologies":"Urban planning and landscape design technologies that optimize green space distribution and accessibility","People":"Urban residents, especially those in underserved neighborhoods","Owner":"Local governments, urban developers, and community organizations"}]}
